name: GeForce NOW Game Shortcut
summary: Learn about .GFNPC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NVIDIA GeForce NOW is an app that allows gamers to stream video games from a virtual machine. To access games, gamers typically open GeForce NOW, select the game, and press the Play button. However, PC gamers can also create desktop shortcuts to games they play frequently, to launch them more quickly.

To create a shortcut to a game, gamers select that game in GeForce NOW and click Create Desktop Shortcut. GeForce NOW then creates a GFNPC file on the gamer's desktop, which uses the filename GeForce NOW Game Name and the .gfnpc extension.

description: A GFNPC file is a desktop shortcut created by NVIDIA GeForce NOW, a cloud gaming service. Users can double-click a GFNPC file to open the game it points to in GeForce NOW. GFNPC files often have the words GeForce NOW in their filename, to denote they are used with GeForce NOW.

instructions: To play the game a GFNPC file points to in GeForce NOW, double-click the file (with GeForce NOW installed).
